Question: Vovo Corporation CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
VOVO Corporation

Smart Bidet Toilet

 - Leading manufacturer in Korea since 2001
 - Specialized in Smart Bidet toilets
 - No.1 exporter of smart toilets in Korea
 - Available in over 30 countries
 - Features own design & technology

Foot & Body Dryer

 - Specialized in Foot & Body Dryers
 - Incorporates proprietary technology
